data.title: Educating Rita details
data.meta_description: Bored with her life as a hairdresser, and under pressure from her husband to start a family, Rita enrolls in literature tutorials at a British university determined to better herself. (Paramount Pictures)
data.text:
Description: Bored with her life as a hairdresser, and under pressure from her husband to start a family, Rita enrolls in literature tutorials at a British university determined to better herself. (Paramount Pictures)

Production Company Acorn Pictures

Release Date Sep 21, 1983

Duration 1 h 50 m

Rating PG

Genres

Tagline A comedy about a teacher and a very memorable student [Video Australia]
